qei_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Quadrature Encoder Interface (QEI)

QEI IO Attributes. More...

#include <qei.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines how the control structure for opening or reconfiguring the QEI port.
